sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Button, Media } from 'reactstrap'; import three from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/3.jpg"; import two from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/2.png"; import eight from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/8.jpg"; import ten from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/10.jpg"; import fourteen from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/14.png"; import four from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/4.jpg"; import { MoreVertical, ThumbsUp, UserPlus, MessageSquare } from 'react-feather'; import RightBar from './rightBar'; import LeftBar from './leftBar'; import {AddFriend,ActivityLog,AnnaMull,DionCast,KarleneLex,WaiSchalk,Hobbies,VellaChism, JasonBorne, } from "../../../../../../../../constant"; const AboutTab = ({ applicantData }) => { return (
Reviews from PREVIOUS completed jobs/gigs regarding this applicant of {applicantData.applicantName}

Below, you will find the 5 MOST RECENT reviews of this user. Please feel free to browser through them and/or contact any of the reviewer's for more information about this applicant & the experience they had with him/her.
{"Hobbies and Interests"}
{Hobbies}:

{"I like to ride the bike to work, swimming, and working out. I also like reading design magazines, go to museums, and binge watching a good tv show while it’s raining outside."}

{"Favourite Music Bands / Artists:"}

{"Iron Maid, DC/AC, Megablow, The Ill, Kung Fighters, System of a Revenge."}
{"Favourite TV Shows:"}

{"Breaking Good, RedDevil, People of Interest, The Running Dead, Found, American Guy."}

{"Favourite Books:"}

{"The Crime of the Century, Egiptian Mythology 101, The Scarred Wizard, Lord of the Wings, Amongst Gods, The Oracle, A Tale of Air and Water."}
{"Favourite Movies:"}

{"Idiocratic, The Scarred Wizard and the Fire Crown, Crime Squad Ferrum Man."}

{"Favourite Writers:"}

{"Martin T. Georgeston, Jhonathan R. Token, Ivana Rowle, Alexandr Platt, Marcus Roth."}
{"Favourite Games:"}

{"The First of Us, Assassin’s Squad, Dark Assylum, NMAK16, Last Cause 4, Grand Snatch Auto."}

{"Other Interests:"}

{"Swimming, Surfing, Scuba Diving, Anime, Photography, Tattoos, Street Art."}
{"Education and Employement"}
{"The New College of Design"}

{"2001 - 2006"}

{"Breaking Good, RedDevil, People of Interest, The Running Dead, Found, American Guy."}

{"Digital Design Intern"}

{"2006-2008"}

{"Digital Design Intern for the “Multimedz” agency. Was in charge of the communication with the clients."}
{"Rembrandt Institute"}

{"2008"}

{"Five months Digital Illustration course. Professor: Leonardo Stagg."}

{"UI/UX Designer"}

{"2001 - 2006"}

{"Breaking Good, RedDevil, People of Interest, The Running Dead, Found, American Guy."}
{"The Digital College"}

{"2010"}

{"6 months intensive Motion Graphics course. After Effects and Premire. Professor: Donatello Urtle."}

{"The New College of Design"}

{"2008 - 2013"}

{"UI/UX Designer for the “Daydreams” agency."}
); }; export default AboutTab;
